snippet: Mr. Dawson gained initial fame in the 1960s playing Cpl. Peter Newkirk, a con man, forger and pickpocket, in the CBS series “Hogan’s Heroes.”
abstract: Richard Dawson, host of Family Feud game show in the 1970s and 1980s, dies at age 79.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Dawson gained initial fame in the 1960s playing Cpl. Peter Newkirk, a con man, forger and pickpocket, in the CBS series “Hogan’s Heroes.”

headline.seo: Richard Dawson, Kissing Host of ‘Family Feud,’ Dies at 79
headline.main: Richard Dawson, Host Who Kissed on ‘Family Feud’, Dies at 79
headline.print_headline: Richard Dawson, 79, Host Who Kissed on ‘Family Feud’
